test_tsdf_map.cc

1 #include <eigen-checks/entrypoint.h>
2 #include <eigen-checks/gtest.h>
3 #include <gtest/gtest.h>
4 
5 #include "voxblox/core/tsdf_map.h"
6 
7 using namespace voxblox; // NOLINT
8 
9 class TsdfMapTest : public ::testing::Test {
10  protected:
11  virtual void SetUp() {
12  config_.tsdf_voxel_size = 0.1f;
13  config_.tsdf_voxels_per_side = 8u;
14  block_size_ = config_.tsdf_voxel_size * config_.tsdf_voxels_per_side;
15  map_ = aligned_shared<TsdfMap>(config_);
16  }
17 
18  TsdfMap::Ptr map_;
19  TsdfMap::Config config_;
20  FloatingPoint block_size_;
21  static constexpr FloatingPoint kEpsilon = 1e-12;
22 };
23 
24 TEST_F(TsdfMapTest, BlockAllocation) {
25  // Should have no blocks by default.
26  EXPECT_EQ(0, map_->getTsdfLayer().getNumberOfAllocatedBlocks());
27  map_->getTsdfLayerPtr()->allocateNewBlockByCoordinates(Point(0.0, 0.15, 0.0));
28  EXPECT_EQ(1, map_->getTsdfLayerPtr()->getNumberOfAllocatedBlocks());
29  map_->getTsdfLayerPtr()->allocateNewBlockByCoordinates(Point(0.0, 0.13, 0.0));
30  EXPECT_EQ(1, map_->getTsdfLayerPtr()->getNumberOfAllocatedBlocks());
31  map_->getTsdfLayerPtr()->allocateNewBlockByCoordinates(
32  Point(-10.0, 13.5, 20.0));
33  EXPECT_EQ(2, map_->getTsdfLayerPtr()->getNumberOfAllocatedBlocks());
34 }
35 
36 TEST_F(TsdfMapTest, IndexLookups) {
37  // BLOCK 0 0 0 (cordinate at origin)
38  Point point_in_0_0_0(0.0, 0.0, 0.0);
39  Block<TsdfVoxel>::Ptr block_0_0_0 =
40  map_->getTsdfLayerPtr()->allocateNewBlockByCoordinates(point_in_0_0_0);
41  ASSERT_TRUE(block_0_0_0.get() != nullptr);
42  EXPECT_TRUE(EIGEN_MATRIX_EQUAL(
43  map_->getTsdfLayerPtr()->computeBlockIndexFromCoordinates(point_in_0_0_0),
44  AnyIndex(0, 0, 0)));
45  EXPECT_TRUE(
46  EIGEN_MATRIX_NEAR(block_0_0_0->origin(), Point(0.0, 0.0, 0.0), kEpsilon));
47  EXPECT_TRUE(
48  EIGEN_MATRIX_EQUAL(block_0_0_0->block_index(), AnyIndex(0, 0, 0)));
49  EXPECT_NEAR(block_0_0_0->block_size(), block_size_, kEpsilon);
50 
51  // BLOCK 0 0 0 (cordinate within block)
52  Point point_in_0_0_0_v2(0.0, config_.tsdf_voxel_size, 0.0);
53  Block<TsdfVoxel>::Ptr block_0_0_0_v2 =
54  map_->getTsdfLayerPtr()->getBlockPtrByCoordinates(point_in_0_0_0_v2);
55  ASSERT_TRUE(block_0_0_0_v2.get() != nullptr);
56  EXPECT_TRUE(EIGEN_MATRIX_EQUAL(
57  map_->getTsdfLayerPtr()->computeBlockIndexFromCoordinates(
58  point_in_0_0_0_v2),
59  AnyIndex(0, 0, 0)));
60  EXPECT_EQ(block_0_0_0, block_0_0_0_v2);
61  EXPECT_TRUE(EIGEN_MATRIX_NEAR(block_0_0_0_v2->origin(), Point(0.0, 0.0, 0.0),
62  kEpsilon));
63  EXPECT_TRUE(
64  EIGEN_MATRIX_EQUAL(block_0_0_0_v2->block_index(), AnyIndex(0, 0, 0)));
65  EXPECT_NEAR(block_0_0_0_v2->block_size(), block_size_, kEpsilon);
66 
67  // BLOCK 1 1 1 (coordinate at origin)
68  Point point_in_1_1_1(block_size_, block_size_, block_size_);
69  Block<TsdfVoxel>::Ptr block_1_1_1 =
70  map_->getTsdfLayerPtr()->allocateNewBlockByCoordinates(point_in_1_1_1);
71  ASSERT_TRUE(block_1_1_1.get() != nullptr);
72  EXPECT_TRUE(EIGEN_MATRIX_EQUAL(
73  map_->getTsdfLayerPtr()->computeBlockIndexFromCoordinates(point_in_1_1_1),
74  AnyIndex(1, 1, 1)));
75  EXPECT_TRUE(EIGEN_MATRIX_NEAR(block_1_1_1->origin(),
76  Point(block_size_, block_size_, block_size_),
77  kEpsilon));
78  EXPECT_TRUE(
79  EIGEN_MATRIX_EQUAL(block_1_1_1->block_index(), AnyIndex(1, 1, 1)));
80  EXPECT_NEAR(block_1_1_1->block_size(), block_size_, kEpsilon);
81 
82  // BLOCK 1 1 1 (coordinate within block)
83  Point point_in_1_1_1_v2(block_size_, block_size_ + config_.tsdf_voxel_size,
84  block_size_);
85  Block<TsdfVoxel>::Ptr block_1_1_1_v2 =
86  map_->getTsdfLayerPtr()->getBlockPtrByCoordinates(point_in_1_1_1_v2);
87  ASSERT_TRUE(block_1_1_1_v2.get() != nullptr);
88  EXPECT_TRUE(EIGEN_MATRIX_EQUAL(
89  map_->getTsdfLayerPtr()->computeBlockIndexFromCoordinates(
90  point_in_1_1_1_v2),
91  AnyIndex(1, 1, 1)));
92  EXPECT_EQ(block_1_1_1, block_1_1_1_v2);
93  EXPECT_TRUE(EIGEN_MATRIX_NEAR(block_1_1_1_v2->origin(),
94  Point(block_size_, block_size_, block_size_),
95  kEpsilon));
96  EXPECT_TRUE(
97  EIGEN_MATRIX_EQUAL(block_1_1_1_v2->block_index(), AnyIndex(1, 1, 1)));
98  EXPECT_NEAR(block_1_1_1_v2->block_size(), block_size_, kEpsilon);
99 
100  // BLOCK -1 -1 -1 (coordinate at origin)
101  Point point_in_neg_1_1_1(-block_size_, -block_size_, -block_size_);
102  Block<TsdfVoxel>::Ptr block_negative_1_1_1 =
103  map_->getTsdfLayerPtr()->allocateNewBlockByCoordinates(
104  point_in_neg_1_1_1);
105  ASSERT_TRUE(block_negative_1_1_1.get() != nullptr);
106  EXPECT_TRUE(EIGEN_MATRIX_EQUAL(
107  map_->getTsdfLayerPtr()->computeBlockIndexFromCoordinates(
108  point_in_neg_1_1_1),
109  AnyIndex(-1, -1, -1)));
110  EXPECT_TRUE(EIGEN_MATRIX_NEAR(block_negative_1_1_1->origin(),
111  Point(-block_size_, -block_size_, -block_size_),
112  kEpsilon));
113  EXPECT_TRUE(EIGEN_MATRIX_EQUAL(block_negative_1_1_1->block_index(),
114  AnyIndex(-1, -1, -1)));
115  EXPECT_NEAR(block_negative_1_1_1->block_size(), block_size_, kEpsilon);
116 
117  // BLOCK -1 -1 -1 (coordinate within block)
118  Point point_in_neg_1_1_1_v2(
119  -block_size_, -block_size_ + config_.tsdf_voxel_size, -block_size_);
120  Block<TsdfVoxel>::Ptr block_negative_1_1_1_v2 =
121  map_->getTsdfLayerPtr()->allocateBlockPtrByCoordinates(
122  point_in_neg_1_1_1_v2);
123  EXPECT_TRUE(EIGEN_MATRIX_EQUAL(
124  map_->getTsdfLayerPtr()->computeBlockIndexFromCoordinates(
125  point_in_neg_1_1_1_v2),
126  AnyIndex(-1, -1, -1)));
127  ASSERT_TRUE(block_negative_1_1_1_v2.get() != nullptr);
128  EXPECT_EQ(block_negative_1_1_1, block_negative_1_1_1_v2);
129  EXPECT_TRUE(EIGEN_MATRIX_NEAR(block_negative_1_1_1_v2->origin(),
130  Point(-block_size_, -block_size_, -block_size_),
131  kEpsilon));
132  EXPECT_TRUE(EIGEN_MATRIX_EQUAL(block_negative_1_1_1_v2->block_index(),
133  AnyIndex(-1, -1, -1)));
134  EXPECT_NEAR(block_negative_1_1_1_v2->block_size(), block_size_, kEpsilon);
135 
136  // Check voxel indexing.
137 
138  // Test in Block 0 0 0
139  {
140  // Test Voxel 0 1 0
141  Point point_in_0_0_0(0.0, 1. * config_.tsdf_voxel_size, 0.0);
142  EXPECT_NE(block_0_0_0->getVoxelPtrByCoordinates(point_in_0_0_0), nullptr);
143 
144  size_t linear_index =
145  block_0_0_0->computeLinearIndexFromCoordinates(point_in_0_0_0);
146  EXPECT_EQ(linear_index, 8u);
147  VoxelIndex voxel_index =
148  block_0_0_0->computeTruncatedVoxelIndexFromCoordinates(point_in_0_0_0);
149  EXPECT_TRUE(EIGEN_MATRIX_EQUAL(voxel_index, AnyIndex(0, 1, 0)));
150 
151  EXPECT_TRUE(EIGEN_MATRIX_EQUAL(
152  voxel_index,
153  block_0_0_0->computeVoxelIndexFromLinearIndex(linear_index)));
154  EXPECT_TRUE(EIGEN_MATRIX_NEAR(
155  point_in_0_0_0,
156  block_0_0_0->computeCoordinatesFromLinearIndex(linear_index),
157  config_.tsdf_voxel_size));
158  EXPECT_TRUE(EIGEN_MATRIX_NEAR(
159  point_in_0_0_0,
160  block_0_0_0->computeCoordinatesFromVoxelIndex(voxel_index),
161  config_.tsdf_voxel_size));
162  }
163  {
164  // Test Voxel 0 0 0
165  Point point_in_0_0_0(0.0, 0.0, 0.0);
166  EXPECT_NE(block_0_0_0->getVoxelPtrByCoordinates(point_in_0_0_0), nullptr);
167 
168  size_t linear_index =
169  block_0_0_0->computeLinearIndexFromCoordinates(point_in_0_0_0);
170  EXPECT_EQ(linear_index, 0u);
171  VoxelIndex voxel_index =
172  block_0_0_0->computeTruncatedVoxelIndexFromCoordinates(point_in_0_0_0);
173  EXPECT_TRUE(EIGEN_MATRIX_EQUAL(voxel_index, AnyIndex(0, 0, 0)));
174 
175  EXPECT_TRUE(EIGEN_MATRIX_EQUAL(
176  voxel_index,
177  block_0_0_0->computeVoxelIndexFromLinearIndex(linear_index)));
178  EXPECT_TRUE(EIGEN_MATRIX_NEAR(
179  point_in_0_0_0,
180  block_0_0_0->computeCoordinatesFromLinearIndex(linear_index),
181  config_.tsdf_voxel_size));
182  EXPECT_TRUE(EIGEN_MATRIX_NEAR(
183  point_in_0_0_0,
184  block_0_0_0->computeCoordinatesFromVoxelIndex(voxel_index),
185  config_.tsdf_voxel_size));
186  }
187  {
188  // Test Voxel 7 7 7
189  Point point_in_0_0_0(7.0 * config_.tsdf_voxel_size,
190  7.0 * config_.tsdf_voxel_size,
191  7.0 * config_.tsdf_voxel_size);
192  EXPECT_NE(block_0_0_0->getVoxelPtrByCoordinates(point_in_0_0_0), nullptr);
193 
194  size_t linear_index =
195  block_0_0_0->computeLinearIndexFromCoordinates(point_in_0_0_0);
196  EXPECT_EQ(linear_index, block_0_0_0->num_voxels() - 1u);
197  VoxelIndex voxel_index =
198  block_0_0_0->computeTruncatedVoxelIndexFromCoordinates(point_in_0_0_0);
199  EXPECT_TRUE(EIGEN_MATRIX_EQUAL(voxel_index,
200  AnyIndex(config_.tsdf_voxels_per_side - 1,
201  config_.tsdf_voxels_per_side - 1,
202  config_.tsdf_voxels_per_side - 1)));
203 
204  EXPECT_TRUE(EIGEN_MATRIX_EQUAL(
205  voxel_index,
206  block_0_0_0->computeVoxelIndexFromLinearIndex(linear_index)));
207  EXPECT_TRUE(EIGEN_MATRIX_NEAR(
208  point_in_0_0_0,
209  block_0_0_0->computeCoordinatesFromLinearIndex(linear_index),
210  config_.tsdf_voxel_size));
211  EXPECT_TRUE(EIGEN_MATRIX_NEAR(
212  point_in_0_0_0,
213  block_0_0_0->computeCoordinatesFromVoxelIndex(voxel_index),
214  config_.tsdf_voxel_size));
215  }
216  // Test in Block -1 -1 -1
217  {
218  // Test Voxel 0 0 0
219  Point point_in_neg_1_1_1(-block_negative_1_1_1->block_size(),
220  -block_negative_1_1_1->block_size(),

279  // Test in Block -1 -1 0

284  5. * config_.tsdf_voxel_size);

287  point_in_neg_1_1_0);

294  nullptr);

296  Point(-block_size_, -block_size_, 0.0),
297  kEpsilon));
298  EXPECT_TRUE(EIGEN_MATRIX_EQUAL(block_neg_1_neg_1_0->block_index(),
299  AnyIndex(-1, -1, 0)));

301 
302  size_t linear_index =
303  block_neg_1_neg_1_0->computeLinearIndexFromCoordinates(
304  point_in_neg_1_1_0);
305  EXPECT_EQ(linear_index, 371u);
306  VoxelIndex voxel_index =
307  block_neg_1_neg_1_0->computeTruncatedVoxelIndexFromCoordinates(
308  point_in_neg_1_1_0);
309  EXPECT_TRUE(EIGEN_MATRIX_EQUAL(voxel_index, AnyIndex(3, 6, 5)));
310 
311  EXPECT_TRUE(EIGEN_MATRIX_EQUAL(
312  voxel_index,
313  block_neg_1_neg_1_0->computeVoxelIndexFromLinearIndex(linear_index)));
314  EXPECT_TRUE(EIGEN_MATRIX_NEAR(
315  point_in_neg_1_1_0,
316  block_neg_1_neg_1_0->computeCoordinatesFromLinearIndex(linear_index),
317  config_.tsdf_voxel_size));
318  EXPECT_TRUE(EIGEN_MATRIX_NEAR(
319  point_in_neg_1_1_0,
320  block_neg_1_neg_1_0->computeCoordinatesFromVoxelIndex(voxel_index),
321  config_.tsdf_voxel_size));
322  }

325 TEST_F(TsdfMapTest, ComputeBlockIndexFromOriginFromBlockIndexTest) {
326  constexpr size_t kBlockVolumeDiameter = 100u;
327  constexpr FloatingPoint kBlockSize = 0.32;
328  constexpr FloatingPoint kBlockSizeInv = 1.0 / kBlockSize;
329 
330  int32_t half_index_range = kBlockVolumeDiameter / 2;
331 
332  for (int32_t x = -half_index_range; x <= half_index_range; ++x) {
333  for (int32_t y = -half_index_range; y <= half_index_range; ++y) {
334  for (int32_t z = -half_index_range; z <= half_index_range; ++z) {
335  BlockIndex block_idx = {x, y, z};
336  Point block_origin = getOriginPointFromGridIndex(block_idx, kBlockSize);
337  BlockIndex block_idx_from_origin =
338  getGridIndexFromOriginPoint<BlockIndex>(block_origin,
339  kBlockSizeInv);
340 
341  EXPECT_EQ(block_idx.x(), block_idx_from_origin.x());
342  EXPECT_EQ(block_idx.y(), block_idx_from_origin.y());
343  EXPECT_EQ(block_idx.z(), block_idx_from_origin.z());
344 
345  if ((block_idx.x() != block_idx_from_origin.x()) ||
346  (block_idx.y() != block_idx_from_origin.y()) ||
347  (block_idx.z() != block_idx_from_origin.z())) {
348  std::cout << std::endl << std::endl;
349  std::cout << "Block idx: " << block_idx.transpose() << std::endl;
350  std::cout << "Block origin: " << block_origin.transpose()
351  << std::endl;
352  std::cout << "Block idx after: " << block_idx_from_origin.transpose()
353  << std::endl
354  << std::endl;
355  ASSERT_TRUE(false);
356  }
357  }
358  }
359  }
360 }
361

364  google::InitGoogleLogging(argv[0]);
365 
366  int result = RUN_ALL_TESTS();
367 
368  return result;
369 }
